sentences.en: a dry wine with flavors of honey and apricot
sentences.cn: 带有蜂蜜和杏子口味的干葡萄酒

sentences.en: Add a splash of lemon juice to flavor the butter.
sentences.cn: 加上一点柠檬汁给黄油调味。

sentences.en: Animal products add flavor and variety to diet and thereby contribute to psychological well - being.
sentences.cn: 畜禽产品丰富了食物的风味和品种,对于心理健康也起一定的作用.

sentences.en: Do you like its flavor?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢它的味道吗?。

sentences.en: Fry quickly to seal in the flavor of the meat.
sentences.cn: 快速把肉油煎一下,以保住其美味.

sentences.en: I blend tea ( s ) so as to obtain a nice flavor.
sentences.cn: 我把不同的茶混合调制以使味道美好.

sentences.en: I consider the eels to be the best quality protein in my line—a very unique flavor of fish, applewood smoke, and a momentary lingering of dark, fall honey.
sentences.cn: 我认为，在我的行当里，鳗鱼是最优质的蛋白质——一种非常独特的风味鱼，用苹果木烟熏，在暗处晾一会，再抹上秋天的蜂蜜。

sentences.en: I know that they have yet to taste anything but when food is described in the right way it creates an imaginary flavor in your mouth.
sentences.cn: 我知道他们还没有尝过任何东西，但是，当人们用正确的方法描述食物的时候，会在口中长生一种想象的味道。

sentences.en: I think the flavor of fresh strawberries is out of this world.
sentences.cn: 我认为新鲜草莓的味道鲜美无比.

sentences.en: It's simple and sincere and has the flavor of an ancient folk song. "
sentences.cn: 素朴真挚,有古代民歌的风味. ”

sentences.en: People need to pick it from the tree before it develops its flavor and full maturity.
sentences.cn: 人们在它们发出果味和完全成熟之前就需要把它们从树上摘下来.

sentences.en: That flavor comes from the sound.
sentences.cn: 那种味道来自说的声音。

sentences.en: The Cola flavor in the drinks comes from the cola nut.
sentences.cn: 饮料中的可乐味道来自可乐果.

sentences.en: The sun - dried tomatoes give the dish a wonderfully rich flavor.
sentences.cn: 晒干的番茄使这道菜味道特别浓郁.

sentences.en: These Pearl gathered, and was pleased with their wild flavor.
sentences.cn: 珠儿采集了这些浆果, 很喜欢那种野果的滋味.

sentences.en: These sardines have a tinny flavor.
sentences.cn: 这些沙丁鱼有马口铁罐头的味道.

sentences.en: This wine is inferior to that one in flavor.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒的味道比那种差.

sentences.en: Vegetables such as peppers can overpower the flavor of the stock.
sentences.cn: 像甜椒这样的蔬菜会抢了原汤的味道。

sentences.en: What flavor ( s ) of icecream do you like?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢哪一种味道的冰淇淋?

sentences.en: When things had flavor , we knew what we were eating all the while ----and it satisfied us .
sentences.cn: 当食物有滋味的时候，我们从头到尾都知道自己吃的是什么，从中得到满足。

sentences.en: Which flavor do you want - chocolate or vanilla?
sentences.cn: 你要哪种味道的，巧克力还是香草？

sentences.en: You need to savour this wine to get its full flavor.
sentences.cn: 要想充分体验这种酒的醇美,你需要慢慢地去品尝.

words.tran_cn: 可口的（等于flavourful）；充满…味道的；有香味的

phrases.tran_cn: 天然香辛料；天然调味料

trans.tran_en: the particular taste of a food or drink
